snippet: ROTH--Shirley Karp, died peacefully on February 3, 2016. An elegant lady who showed great strength and wisdom. Beloved wife of Theodore, then briefly Norman. Exceptional mother to Jane and son-in-law Larry. Giving grandmother to Kimberly, Laurie and James. Great-grandmother to Sydney and Etan. Always a wordsmith and lover of languages, Shirley loved to see the humor in life. Rest peacefully, we will miss you terribly. 1/3
